simplified: 书中自有黄金屋，书中自有颜如玉
traditional: 書中自有黃金屋，書中自有顏如玉
pinyin: shu1 zhong1 zi4 you3 huang2 jin1 wu1 , shu1 zhong1 zi4 you3 yan2 ru2 yu4

definitions.shu1 zhong1 zi4 you3 huang2 jin1 wu1 , s: lit. in books are sumptuous houses and graceful ladies (proverb); fig. be diligent in your studies, success and glory will follow;
